en.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Red Veil’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Revered. The weapons include Dark Dagger, Embolist, and Mire.

ru.description: один из шести основных синдикатов. Имеют в своём арсенале моды для таких варфреймов, как Эш, Эмбер, Локи, Некрос, Миса, Сарина, Вольт, Зефир и Атлас.

ko.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Red Veil’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Revered. The weapons include Dark Dagger, Embolist, and Mire.

de.description: Tenno who ally themselves with this Syndicate will receive unique Augment Mods for Red Veil’s favoured weapons after obtaining the title of Revered. The weapons include Dark Dagger, Embolist, and Mire.

zh-hans.description: 与血色面纱结盟的Tenno在获得崇敬的称号后，可以获得这些独特的强化Mod，用于血色面纱偏好的武器和战甲。

zh-hant.description: 與血色面紗結盟的Tenno在獲得崇敬的稱號後，可以獲得這些獨特的強化Mod，用於血色面紗偏好的武器和戰甲。

es.item_name: Mod de aumento de Velo Rojo
es.description: Los Tenno quienes se unan por si mismos a este Sindicato tendran acceso a los Mods de aumento únicos para armas que favorecen al Velo Rojo despues de obtener el titulo de Venerado. Estas arma incluyen la Daga oscura, Embolist, y Mire.
